snippet: Warren E. Buffett rejects the notion that Berkshire Hathaway will go the way of Teledyne. | Bank of America has reached a $1.7 billion agreement with the bond insurer MBIA. | A crowd of young men gathered on Monday in Union Square in Manhattan to buy...
abstract: Warren E. Buffett rejects the notion that Berkshire Hathaway will go the way of Teledyne. | Bank of America has reached a $1.7 billion agreement with the bond insurer MBIA. | A crowd of young men gathered on Monday in Union Square in Manhattan to buy and sell bitcoins. | The most recent episode of “Mad Men” provided a lesson in ad agency deal-making, circa 1968.
